response.original_title: The Heart of Rock and Roll: A Cleveland Rocks Story
response.overview: If you haven’t heard... Cleveland rocks! Cleveland music developer David Spero takes the audience on a tour of his lifelong music career and all the legends he’s met along the way. Hear exclusive interviews from some of these great artists and enjoy an array of music videos and live performances from some of your favorites, including Michael Stanley and Joe Walsh. This film celebrates the history of Cleveland’s music scene.
response.title: The Heart of Rock and Roll: A Cleveland Rocks Story
